name: Hugo Tessier
portraitPrompt: Portrait of Hugo Tessier, French male fashion designer. Post-industrial concrete studio, dramatic chiaroscuro side lighting, raw textured walls. Wears deconstructed oversized jacket with exposed seams and raw hem trousers. Intense focused gaze, artist confidence. High-contrast editorial photography, 8K.
bannerPrompt: Brand editorial banner for Hugo Tessier Studio. Industrial warehouse space, concrete floors, deconstructed black garments draped over rusted steel girders. Chiaroscuro lighting, deep architectural shadows, raw material textures. Post-industrial fashion atmosphere. No text, wide cinematic format, 8K.

collections.name: Void
collections.coverPrompt: Fashion collection editorial "Void" by Hugo Tessier Studio. All-black deconstructed garments on pure black concrete floor, single dramatic spotlight. Void aesthetic, architectural negative space composition. Raw edges. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Industrial
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Industrial" by Hugo Tessier Studio. Khaki and rust deconstructed pieces with metal hardware on rusted corrugated iron surface. Harsh overhead industrial light, deep texture shadows, utilitarian rawness. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Ghost
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Ghost" by Hugo Tessier Studio. Bleached and undyed deconstructed garments, ash-white spectral tones, on foggy white concrete. Diffused atmospheric light, deliberate spectral deconstruction, ethereal. No text, 8K.

products.name: Veste déconstruite
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, full garment shot. Deconstructed asymmetric canvas jacket in {color}, hanging on industrial hook. Raw unhemmed edges, asymmetric lapels, exposed interior seams, metal grommets. Hard sidelight, concrete background. Hugo Tessier Studio. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, rear product shot. Deconstructed jacket back in {color} heavy canvas. Raw unhemmed back hem, visible interior seam allowances, asymmetric back panel construction. Industrial raking light, concrete. Hugo Tessier Studio. 8K.

products.name: Cargo déconstruit
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, full silhouette. Raw-hem cargo trousers in {color} ripstop cotton, ghost mannequin. Oversized asymmetric patch pockets front, raw waistband seaming, deconstructed fly. Hard industrial directional light. Hugo Tessier Studio. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: MACRO DETAIL. Cargo pocket surface in {color} cotton ripstop. Raw unhemmed pocket edge showing weave, visible tack stitching, worn canvas texture. Raking macro industrial light. Hugo Tessier Studio. 8K.

products.name: Hoodie déstructuré
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, overhead flat lay. Deconstructed oversized hoodie in {color} French terry on raw concrete floor. Dropped asymmetric shoulders, raw-cut hood, elongated hem. Top-down directional light. Hugo Tessier Studio. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, flat lay rear. Hoodie back in {color} French terry on concrete. Asymmetric dropped back seam, exposed raw hood edge rear, two-layer fleece cross-section. Raking macro light. Hugo Tessier Studio. 8K.

products.name: Crewneck architectural
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, worn torso shot. Architectural oversized crewneck in {color} midweight cotton, male model neck to waist only. Deep front pleat construction, extended elongated hem, boxy dropped shoulder front. Natural post-industrial light. Hugo Tessier Studio. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, worn torso rear. Crewneck back in {color} sweat jersey, male model neck to waist. Rear asymmetric seam construction, elongated back hem drop, ribbed cuff rear detail. Directional light. Hugo Tessier Studio. 8K.

products.name: Veste coach utilitaire
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, flat lay. Utility coach jacket in {color} nylon-cotton twill, snaps open showing interior. Multiple utility pockets front, raw edges, woven brand label at chest. Hard overhead industrial light. Hugo Tessier Studio. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: MACRO DETAIL. Coach jacket snap and pocket in {color} twill. Metal snap button mechanism close-up, welt pocket raw edge construction layers, woven label texture. Industrial macro. Hugo Tessier Studio. 8K.

name: Nadia Forte
portraitPrompt: Portrait of Nadia Forte, French female lingerie designer. Elegant boudoir studio, warm amber ambient light, antique silk draped in background. Refined ivory blouse and delicate gold chain. Calm artisan confidence, precise and gentle. Soft editorial photography, 8K.
bannerPrompt: Brand banner for Forte Lingerie. Intimate boudoir still life: Calais needle-lace fabric draped on warm Carrara marble, single fresh rose petal, antique perfume bottle, warm amber light. Artisan lingerie brand identity. No text, wide horizontal, 8K.

collections.name: Dentelle Héritage
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Dentelle Héritage" by Forte Lingerie. Black Calais needle-lace arranged on antique silk, intricate lace medallion pattern in warm directional light. Heritage boudoir aesthetic, heirloom craft. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Soie Nue
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Soie Nue" by Forte Lingerie. Nude silk charmeuse draped in soft natural daylight on white marble, second-skin sheen and bias movement. Single dried rose. Minimal, intimate, pure elegance. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Velours Rouge
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Velours Rouge" by Forte Lingerie. Burgundy velvet draped dramatically over marble, deep jewel tones, pile texture revealing direction in raking candlelight. Opulent boudoir atmosphere. No text, 8K.

products.name: Body dentelle
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, flat lay boudoir. Artisan lace body in {color} on ivory silk. Intricate needle-lace front pattern, scalloped hem, snap crotch visible. Soft warm light from above. Forte Lingerie. Tasteful. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, flat lay rear boudoir. Lace body back in {color} on ivory silk. Rear snap crotch closure, back seam lace construction, scalloped back hem. Warm candlelight macro. Forte Lingerie. 8K.

products.name: Soutien-gorge balconnet
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, worn torso. Balconnet bra in {color} on female model torso, tasteful boudoir. Half-cup front structure, delicate straps, satin bow at center front. Warm amber side light. Forte Lingerie. Tasteful. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: MACRO DETAIL, close-up. Balconnet bra front detail in {color}: underwire cup stitching, satin bow trim, strap-to-cup hardware, fine picot elastic edge. Warm boudoir macro. Forte Lingerie. 8K.

products.name: Culotte taille haute
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, marble flat lay. High-waist lingerie brief in {color} on warm Carrara marble. Smooth jersey front panel, lace waistband insert front, French-cut leg lace trim. Soft boudoir light. Forte Lingerie. Tasteful. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, marble flat lay rear. High-waist brief back in {color} on marble. Full lace back panel, scalloped rear hem, picot elastic leg edge rear. Warm boudoir macro. Forte Lingerie. 8K.

products.name: Nuisette
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, hanging on hanger. Silk charmeuse nuisette in {color} on antique silver satin hanger. Bias-cut front silhouette, lace bodice insert front, thin spaghetti straps. Romantic backlight showing sheer quality. Forte Lingerie. Tasteful. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, hanging rear. Nuisette back in {color} silk charmeuse on hanger. Lace back panel, bias-cut back drape, thin strap rear, adjustable clasp hardware. Warm candlelight. Forte Lingerie. 8K.

products.name: Ensemble 2 pièces
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, flat lay boudoir. Matching lingerie set in {color}: bralette above and high-waist brief below on ivory silk. Coordinated Calais lace trim front, matching bow hardware. Soft warm overhead light. Forte Lingerie. Tasteful. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: MACRO DETAIL. Lingerie set lace detail in {color}: matching needle-lace pattern on bralette cup and brief waistband edge side by side. Bow and elastic trim. Warm boudoir macro. Forte Lingerie. 8K.

name: Yasmine Larbi
portraitPrompt: Portrait of Yasmine Larbi, French-Algerian female jewelry designer. Clean white atelier, natural soft sidelight. Wears her own layered geometric gold necklaces and wide sculptural cuff bracelet. Serene artisan precision, creative confidence. Editorial portrait, 8K.
bannerPrompt: Brand banner for Yasmine Bijoux. Geometric gold and bronze jewelry pieces on white Carrara marble, casting precise geometric shadow patterns. Zellij mosaic tile reference in composition. Contemporary artisan jewelry identity. No text, wide horizontal, 8K.

collections.name: Zellige
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Zellige" by Yasmine Bijoux. Gold metal geometric jewelry arranged in deliberate zellij mosaic pattern on white marble. Warm dramatic raking light revealing metal facets and hand-stamped textures. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Touareg
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Touareg" by Yasmine Bijoux. Oxidized silver jewelry with protective cross and compass-rose motifs on dark desert-sand stone. Atmospheric North African cultural reference, moody directional light. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Nuit de Blida
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Nuit de Blida" by Yasmine Bijoux. Dark bronze jewelry with crescent and star forms on deep midnight blue velvet. Night sky atmosphere, low key dramatic light. Romantic cultural poetry. No text, 8K.

products.name: Collier architecture
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, flat lay jewelry. Architectural statement necklace in {color} cast metal on white Carrara marble. Large geometric pendant front face, zellij-inspired facets, hand-stamped surface, adjustable chain. Multi-point jewelry lighting. Yasmine Bijoux. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: MACRO DETAIL, pendant reverse. Necklace pendant back in {color} cast metal. Rear bail attachment, hand-stamped back surface, chain-to-bail soldering, patina texture depth. Raking macro jewelry light. Yasmine Bijoux. 8K.

products.name: Boucles asymétriques
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, worn portrait. Asymmetric statement earrings in {color} cast metal, female model ear and jaw close-up. Different geometric drop form per ear, hand-stamped front surface. Soft directional studio light. Yasmine Bijoux. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, velvet display. Earring pair rear in {color} cast metal on dark velvet. Both ear post attachments visible, back surface texture, fastening clasps detail. Macro jewelry light. Yasmine Bijoux. 8K.

products.name: Bracelet manchette
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, worn wrist. Wide cuff bracelet in {color} metal on female wrist and forearm. Full front face of hand-stamped geometric pattern across surface, open-back form visible at sides. Raking sidelight. Yasmine Bijoux. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW / INTERIOR. Cuff bracelet interior and open edge in {color} metal. Interior curve surface texture, open-back edge construction profile, hammered background. Extreme raking macro light. Yasmine Bijoux. 8K.

products.name: Bague sculptée
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, flat lay jewelry. Sculptural wide-band ring in {color} cast metal on black velvet display. Geometric zellij-inspired faceted front surface, architectural band. Precision multi-point jewelry lighting. Yasmine Bijoux. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: MACRO DETAIL, interior view. Ring interior and side profile in {color} cast metal. Interior comfort-fit curve surface, hand-filed edge profile, band thickness cross-section. Multi-light macro. Yasmine Bijoux. 8K.

products.name: Parure complète
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, editorial flat lay. Complete jewelry parure in {color}: statement necklace, asymmetric earrings, wide cuff bracelet, sculptural ring arranged on white marble. Dramatic raking light showing all textures. Yasmine Bijoux. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: MACRO DETAIL, cluster. Parure detail in {color}: necklace pendant, bracelet surface, ring band clustered together showing scale relationships and consistent geometric hand-stamped vocabulary. Yasmine Bijoux. 8K.

name: Marie Durand
portraitPrompt: Portrait of Marie Durand, French female children's clothing designer. Warm natural-light atelier, undyed linen backdrop, wooden toys and fabric swatches as props. Simple organic cotton blouse. Warm maternal creative energy. Soft artisan editorial portrait, 8K.
bannerPrompt: Brand banner for Petit Atelier Marie Durand. Aerial flat lay of tiny handmade children's garments on natural undyed linen: white onesie, knitted booties, smocked dress. Embroidery hoop with flower motif in progress, wooden buttons, organic cotton thread spools. Warm window light. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Premiers Pas
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Premiers Pas" by Petit Atelier Marie Durand. Baby garments in pure white and ecru organic cotton on undyed linen: onesie, knitted cardigan, soft booties. Single dried chamomile flower. Warm natural window light. Pure and gentle. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Grandir Doucement
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Grandir Doucement" by Petit Atelier Marie Durand. Children's garments in warm earth tones - camel, sage green, terracotta - with wooden toys and autumn leaves on linen. Warm natural light. Playful and refined. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Dimanche Matin
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Dimanche Matin" by Petit Atelier Marie Durand. Special occasion children's garments in fine white linen with broderie anglaise, arranged with fresh lily-of-the-valley. Soft Sunday-morning light. Tender and celebratory. No text, 8K.

products.name: Barboteuse brodée
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, flat lay natural. Baby onesie barboteuse in {color} GOTS organic cotton on undyed linen. Hand-embroidered botanical flower on chest front, pearl snap shoulder closures. Warm natural window daylight overhead. Petit Atelier Durand. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, flat lay rear. Baby onesie back in {color} organic cotton on linen. Rear snap shoulder closure, back yoke seaming, organic fabric texture rear. Natural light macro, warm tones. Petit Atelier Durand. 8K.

products.name: Cardigan bébé
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, flat lay. Hand-knitted baby cardigan in {color} organic merino wool on cotton muslin. 2x2 rib button band front, small round collar, three carved wooden buttons. Soft natural overhead daylight. Petit Atelier Durand. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, flat lay rear. Baby cardigan back in {color} organic merino on muslin. Seamless knit back panel, ribbed back collar edge, knit stitch pattern rear, cuff detail. Warm natural light macro. Petit Atelier Durand. 8K.

products.name: Robe enfant smockée
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, dress form. Hand-smocked child's dress in {color} cotton voile on children's dress form. Honeycomb smocking bodice front, Peter Pan collar, puff sleeves front. Soft natural studio light. Petit Atelier Durand. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, dress form rear. Smocked dress back in {color} cotton voile on form. Rear button closure at back neck, back bodice gathering, puff sleeve rear construction. Natural light. Petit Atelier Durand. 8K.

products.name: Salopette enfant
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, flat lay. Child's dungarees in {color} organic cotton canvas on linen. Front bib with hand-embroidered sun motif, brass button adjustable straps, deep side pockets front. Warm natural light. Petit Atelier Durand. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, flat lay rear. Dungarees rear in {color} cotton canvas on linen. Back bib strap attachment, reinforced knee seat area, back pocket, strap buckle rear. Natural light macro. Petit Atelier Durand. 8K.

products.name: Veste réversible
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, flat lay. Reversible child's jacket in {color} outer with botanical-print inner, half-turned to reveal both fabric sides simultaneously. Snap closures front, spread collar. Soft natural light. Petit Atelier Durand. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: MACRO DETAIL. Reversible jacket edge binding in {color}: solid outer and botanical-print inner fabric visible simultaneously at folded edge, snap button mechanism, collar seam quality. Natural light macro. Petit Atelier Durand. 8K.

name: Louis Renard
portraitPrompt: Portrait of Louis Renard, French male techwear outerwear designer. Minimalist clinical white studio, precise flat panel lighting. Wears his own modular technical jacket: multiple sealed pockets, YKK zipper systems, hardware details. Analytical engineering mindset. Sharp editorial photography, 8K.
bannerPrompt: Brand editorial banner for Renard Outerwear. Technical flat lay on white grid paper: modular jacket components separated, YKK zipper samples, waxed canvas swatch, taped seam cross-section. Engineering blueprint meets fashion. No text, wide horizontal, 8K.

collections.name: System_01
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "System_01" by Renard Outerwear. All-black technical garments with military precision on white grid surface, modular pocket systems open showing internal organization. Stealth techwear engineering aesthetic. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Terroir
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Terroir" by Renard Outerwear. Waxed canvas garments in earth tones - olive, dark ochre, bark brown - on raw weathered oak surface. Waxed fabric sheen, technical seams, functional heritage craft. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Surplus
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Surplus" by Renard Outerwear. Military surplus-inspired garments in field olive, rust oxide, sand arranged with precision on distressed concrete. Utilitarian reinterpretation, technical detail focus. No text, 8K.

products.name: Parka modulaire
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, ghost mannequin. Modular technical parka in {color} ripstop nylon, full front silhouette. Zip-off hood attached, six sealed YKK zipper pockets front, articulated sleeve, taped waterproof seams visible. Precision studio light. Renard Outerwear. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, ghost mannequin rear. Technical parka back in {color} ripstop. Rear hood zip attachment, back seam taping, articulated rear sleeve panel, taped back hem construction. Engineering macro. Renard Outerwear. 8K.

products.name: Manteau architecturale
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, worn torso. Architectural structured overcoat in {color} heavy wool-nylon on male model shoulders to mid-thigh. Exaggerated dropped shoulders, geometric hem, concealed magnetic snap placket closed, lapels. Clean editorial light. Renard Outerwear. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, worn torso rear. Overcoat back in {color} wool blend, male model. Back seam precision stitching, rear dropped shoulder seam, geometric back hem. Clean editorial light rear. Renard Outerwear. 8K.

products.name: Veste matelassée
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, flat lay on grid. Technical quilted vest in {color} ripstop nylon on white grid paper. Engineered baffle channel quilting front, three sealed zipper pockets front, technical collar with cinch. Sharp overhead light. Renard Outerwear. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, flat lay rear. Quilted vest rear in {color} ripstop nylon on grid paper. Back baffle channel quilting pattern, rear zipper pocket, cinch cord at back hem. Technical overhead light. Renard Outerwear. 8K.

products.name: Trench technique
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, hanging on hook. Technical trench coat in {color} waxed cotton-nylon. Traditional silhouette front: double-breasted storm flap, button placket, belt tied, sealed utility pocket flaps. Dramatic side light. Renard Outerwear. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, hanging rear. Technical trench back in {color} waxed fabric. Back vent construction, rear belt attachment point, taped back seams, technical buckle cuffs from behind. Dramatic side light. Renard Outerwear. 8K.

products.name: Blouson aviateur
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, worn torso. Aviator bomber jacket in {color} technical nylon on male model shoulders to hips. Ribbed knit collar front, zip closed, oversized chest cargo pocket, MA-1 silhouette front. Natural editorial light. Renard Outerwear. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, worn torso rear. Bomber jacket rear in {color} technical nylon. Back panel construction, ribbed waistband rear, back seam and shoulder detail. Natural editorial light rear. Renard Outerwear. 8K.

name: Camille Petit
portraitPrompt: Portrait of Camille Petit, French female fashion designer and botanical illustrator. Sun-dappled atelier with botanical illustration boards, pressed flowers in frames, brushes and paint. Wears flowing silk dress in her own hand-illustrated botanical print. Romantic, warm, artistic. Natural light editorial, 8K.
bannerPrompt: Brand banner for Studio Camille. Flowing botanical-print silk draped over vintage Thonet chair, pressed dried botanicals arranged around it, open illustrated sketchbook showing print in progress. Warm afternoon light, romantic creative atelier. No text, wide horizontal, 8K.

collections.name: Herbier
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Herbier" by Studio Camille. Botanical-print silk garments in sage, ivory, moss tones with pressed fern specimens and botanical illustration pages on linen. Warm diffused natural light, ethereal artisan quality. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Valse
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Valse" by Studio Camille. Deep jewel-tone garments - burgundy velvet, midnight silk, emerald voile - on dark marble with scattered rose petals and dried eucalyptus. Romantic theatrical editorial. No text, 8K.

collections.name: Plein Air
collections.coverPrompt: Collection "Plein Air" by Studio Camille. Liberty-cotton floral printed garments in warm rose and ivory on wooden garden table with fresh wildflowers. Playful, pastoral, everyday romantic mood. No text, 8K.

products.name: Robe midi botanique
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, worn model. Botanical-print midi dress in {color} silk blend, female model collarbone to knee. Hand-illustrated botanical all-over print front, A-line silhouette, puff sleeves, self-fabric ribbon waist tied. Natural light. Studio Camille. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, worn model rear. Botanical dress back in {color} silk blend. Rear neckline closure, puff sleeve rear construction, A-line skirt back, botanical print rear view. Natural light. Studio Camille. 8K.

products.name: Blouse romantique
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, hanging on clear hanger. Romantic ruffle blouse in {color} silk georgette at window. Tiered cascade ruffles front, puffed sleeves, Victorian-inspired collar front. Backlit natural light showing transparency and movement. Studio Camille. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, hanging rear on hanger. Ruffle blouse back in {color} silk georgette. Rear button closure row, back collar attachment, puff sleeve rear, back ruffle cascade. Romantic natural backlight. Studio Camille. 8K.

products.name: Jupe évasée imprimée
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, overhead flat lay. Circular flared printed skirt in {color} with botanical print, full circular sweep at midi length from above. Hand-illustrated floral front, delicate waistband, small self-bow. Natural overhead light. Studio Camille. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, overhead flat lay rear. Printed skirt back in {color} from above: rear waistband, back seam, full circular back hem sweep, botanical print rear view. Natural overhead light. Studio Camille. 8K.

products.name: Robe velours maxi
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, worn model. Maxi velvet dress in {color} crushed silk-velvet, female model shoulders to ankles, 3/4 front angle. Empire waist satin ribbon, romantic bishop sleeves front, floor-length skirt front. Single directional raking light. Studio Camille. 8K.
products.detailTemplate: BACK VIEW, worn model rear. Velvet maxi dress rear in {color}. Back bodice construction, bishop sleeve rear gathered cuff, long rear skirt velvet pile crush texture. Directional raking light showing pile. Studio Camille. 8K.

products.name: Robe portefeuille
products.heroTemplate: FRONT VIEW, ghost mannequin. Floral wrap dress in {color} liberty-print cotton, front silhouette. Wrap overlap front with botanical print, self-tie belt, flutter sleeves front, midi flare. Natural light. Studio Camille. 8K.
